thread.title: Watch: Akdong Musician Releases Beautiful Teaser For Collab With Veteran Singer Yang Hee Eun
thread.title_full: Watch: Akdong Musician Releases Beautiful Teaser For Collab With Veteran Singer Yang Hee Eun

author: uing
title: Watch: Akdong Musician Releases Beautiful Teaser For Collab With Veteran Singer Yang Hee Eun
text:
Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Akdong Musician and veteran singer Yang Hee Eun are teaming up for a new track titled “Tree,” and the video teaser is now out! 
The video begins with the sibling duo’s exquisite harmony and ends with Lee Soo Hyun’s resonant voice, making listeners want to hear more. In contrast with Akdong Musician’s usual bright songs, “Tree” has a heavier melody line and deeper lyrics. 
The song is set to be released on March 15 at noon KST. 
Watch the teaser below!
